MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK9 postcode area of Stirling. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.26pm due to a banging underground cable on Causewayhead road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:47PM on Sunday 24 January 2021.
